text: yo the app won't let me add a frosty to my order?? this is a crisis

text: not being able to add a frosty IS a crisis actually. try closing the app and reopening? if that doesn't work DM us and we'll figure this out together

text: We understand your frustration with our mobile application. Please try the following troubleshooting steps: 1) Clear cache 2) Reinstall app 3) Contact support if issue persists.

text: just went through the drive thru and they forgot my sauce packets. again. like how does this keep happening

text: We apologize for the repeated oversight. This is not reflective of our quality standards. Please provide your location details via DM so we may follow up with the management team.

text: do yall still have breakfast or was that just a fever dream i had
notes: Humorous question about breakfast

text: breakfast is very real and happening right now bestie. breakfast baconator hits different at 8am tbh
notes: On-brand: matches customer's humor, casual product mention, Gen Z language

text: Yes, Wendy's breakfast is available daily at participating locations. Please visit our website for menu details and hours of operation at your nearest restaurant.
notes: Off-brand: corporate FAQ response, misses humor opportunity

text: my order number has been on the board for 20 minutes. im literally standing here. hello???
notes: Frustrated customer, real-time situation

text: okay 20 minutes is way too long and you shouldn't have to wait like that. can you tell the crew your order number? if they're still not helping DM us the location asap
notes: On-brand: urgent acknowledgment, actionable advice, escalation path

text: We apologize for the extended wait time. Please bring this to the attention of the on-duty manager immediately. If the issue is not resolved, contact our customer care line.
